fields.name: Insanity (Passive):
fields.value: You receieve a Demonic role when rolling for roles instead of the Lunatic. Your feedback will emulate that role, however nothing happens. Investigative results are arbitrary. (Decided by the host) This role can only spawn if a Demonic role also spawns. The demonic role knows who you are and learns your night actions each night. You have a factional chat with non-Demonic players of the faction you learn you are a part of.
